page.name: Red Riding Hood
page.description: There certainly are a lot of wolves around here. I wonder who lives in this stretch of woods.

properties.name: Red Riding Hood
properties.description: There certainly are a lot of wolves around here. I wonder who lives in this stretch of woods.
properties.complete: Wow, Red was mad. I mean really mad. Perhaps I should send a basket of goodies. It might be too early though. Perhaps I should wait a week or so.

page.name: Gramma's Wand
page.description: Gramma had a wand made from the axe that was used on the big bad wolf that turned her into a werewolf.
